long-description.p: The ABP Air Actuated Electric Palletizer by Carl Stahl American Lifting are available used at American Surplus! These palletizers both operate and install easily; just hook them up to your current air system, set your desired pressure to determine load height, and you're ready to go! An easy to use foot switch allows you to control your load level for quick loading and height adjustment. Your choice to add an air-actuated palletizer or other type of lift table allows your staff to quickly and efficiently palletize loads while minimizing bending, reducing worker fatigue. These American Lifting Palletizer are capable of handling loads from 1,000 to 4,500 lbs, ensuring that it can handle a wide array of challenges you choose to throw at it.
